result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

defendant.name: Mistic, Joshua James

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: /s/ TTF 11/11/16 - dismissed with prejudice:  Reason - Defendant successfully completed the DPA

ADDRESS INFO for Joshua James Mistic
Current: 3900 Irvine Ave NW Trlr 730, Bemidji, MN 56601-4245 United States  (Effective: 11-23-2015)
Prior: 8040 Cty Tk Ff, Wisconsin Rapids, WI 54494

Defendant Joshua James Mistic in court with attorney Jared Redfield. Cass W Cousins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

10:59 AM Clerk enters the courtroom.
Court previously called the case.

Court reitersates what happened in Court for the Clerk's benefit.

Defendant entered plea to single count of DC in 15CM-254.
Court went over rights and waiver thereof.
Court accepted Defendant's plea but did not enter a judgment of conviction due to parties agreement that a Deferred Prosecution Agreement would be entered.

BY THE COURT:
Court dismissed and read in 15CM-400.

Atty Cousins addressed the Court.
Atty Redfield addressed the Court.

BY THE COURT:
Court approves the agreement in its entirety.
For a period of 12 Months

DPA is given back to the State to make copies and original to be returned to Clerk of Courts. 

The plea was NO CONTEST.
$500 sig bond:  Be  Do not have direct/indirect contact with the following persons/places:  Kyra Mistic  *Unle

Attorney Jared Redfield in court. Cass W Cousins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Redfield states an Authorization was filed today with the Clerk of Courts. Attorney received copy of Criminal Complaint and waived its reading.
Court informs Defendant of Charges and maximum penalties.
P/ng entered
BTC: $500 sig bond:  Be  Do not have direct/indirect contact with the following persons/places:  Kyra Mistic  *Unless the victim goes to CAP Services to get a Family Safety Plan and then files the form with the Clerk of Courts and District Attorney.  If filed, then no abusive contact with the above named.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 19, 2015 at 10:30 am.
